tooltip.jewelcharms.jewel_socket_templat: Used to attach jewels to tools at a Smithing Table
patchouli.book.jewelcharms.name: Jewel Charms Guide
patchouli.book.jewelcharms.landing_text: Welcome to the enchanting world of Jewel Charms! This comprehensive guide will teach you everything about crafting powerful jewels, attaching them to your tools and weapons, and mastering the art of material combinations. May your tools shine with brilliance!
jewel_effect.quantum_harvest.desc: Breaking crops swaps them with other crops in the world
jewel_effect.biome_resonance.desc: Tool behavior changes based on biome - ice in tundra, fire in desert
jewel_effect.moon_phase_sensitivity.desc: Power waxes and wanes with moon phases - strongest at full moon
jewel_effect.weather_siphon.desc: Tool charges in rain/thunder, depletes in sunshine, provides bonuses when charged
jewel_effect.domino_effect.desc: Progressive drop multiplier - 1x, 2x, 3x... Resets when breaking different blocks
jewel_effect.gravity_tether.desc: Mob drops orbit you instead of falling - press key to collect all
jewel_effect.sound_harvesting.desc: Breaking blocks generates musical notes - completing melodies grants bonus loot
